meaningMnemonic: When a <radical>spirit</radical> lives in a <radical>sheep</radical> it becomes the most <kanji>auspicious</kanji> creature on the planet. Lights shine out of it and the whole world weeps at its beauty. Look at the sheep's fluffy glowing head. Nothing could be more auspicious and glorious than this.
readingMnemonic: The spirit sheep is so <kanji>auspicious</kanji> that the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) declares this day to be the most auspicious of all days. The day when the spirit sheep appeared.
